about.name: Vashchuk Roman Yuriyovych
about.quote: I don't rush to explain myself.

description.observe: I observe more than I speak.
description.love: I love control, silence, and structure.

about.ending: Some are better understood without asking.

intro.title_line1: I don't create an image â€”
intro.text: There is no aim to impress. There is only an attempt to leave a trace in the silence.

home.about: I am an ordinary person who enjoys growing, trying new things, and creating my own. This site is not about a profession, but about me: my interests, thoughts, and path.

block1.title: Observation
block1.text: I observe more than I explain.

block2.title: Order
block2.text: Things have their place and time.

block3.title: Depth
block3.text: The surface does not interest me.

home.quote: â€œThis site is my space on the web.â€

intro.text: What matters here is not superficial perception, but what remains after reflection and observation.

depth.about: Depth is attentiveness to details, understanding meaning, and what shapes my worldview.

intro.text: This is not about entertainment. It's about moments when nothing needs to be proven.

free.about: In my free time, I don't seek benefit or results. These are moments where I can pause, be alone with my thoughts, and return to simple things that are usually lost in the noise.

block1.title: ğŸ§ Music
block1.text: A backdrop for thoughts and silence. Sometimes on repeat, sometimes in the background.

block2.title: ğŸ“– Books
block2.text: I don't read quickly, but attentively. What remains is more important than how much.

block3.title: ğŸŒ™ Silence
block3.text: Space without noise. That's where thoughts are born.

block4.title: ğŸ§  Observation
block4.text: Of people, details, myself. Not everything requires words.

block5.title: ğŸƒ Sport
block5.text: Movement not for results. For clarity of mind and self-control.

intro.text: This is a period without rush. I observe, think, and learn to understand what truly matters.

learn.about: I'm not trying to keep up with everything. Right now, what's important to me is understanding what I do and why. I am interested in growth without haste, depth without pretense, and honesty with myself.

block1.title: ğŸ§© Self-development
block1.text: Mindfulness, inner stability, and working on myself without unnecessary noise.

intro.text: Details, people, and moments. Observation helps notice what usually remains unseen.

observe.about: Observation is a way to be attentive to the world around me, to understand people and situations, to notice patterns and details that form the complete picture.

block1.title: ğŸ‘€ People
block1.text: I pay attention to behavior, reactions, emotions, and subtle manifestations of character.

block2.title: ğŸ” Details
block2.text: Things that seem insignificant at first glance: sounds, movements, the atmosphere of a space.

block3.title: ğŸ§  Myself
block3.text: Observing my own thoughts and emotions helps me understand my decisions and behavior.

observe.quote: â€œTo understand the world, first learn to look attentively.â€

intro.text: When there is order around, it's easier to maintain peace of mind. Even small systems create clarity and confidence.

order.about: Order is not just about physical things. It's about processes, habits, and systems that help you focus and make decisions without unnecessary noise.

block1.title: ğŸ“‚ Space
block1.text: Organizing work and living spaces for clarity and comfort.

block2.title: ğŸ•° Habits

block3.title: âš™ï¸ Processes
block3.text: Systems for working on projects and tasks that reduce chaos and increase efficiency.

block4.title: ğŸ“‹ Planning
block4.text: I set goals and break them down into small steps to make progress easy and clear.

block5.title: ğŸ§¹ Cleanliness
block5.text: External order helps bring internal thoughts into order.

block6.title: ğŸ“š Self-development
block6.text: I improve myself and develop new skills through small daily steps.

block7.title: ğŸ¯ Focus
block7.text: I focus only on what's important to avoid unnecessary noise and distraction.

intro.text: These are not chaotic ideas or mental noise. Each is a small step towards something that gradually takes shape and meaning.

plan.about: Ideas, plans, and concepts I'm currently working on. Small experiments and big projects that are gradually taking shape and finding their way.
